System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Properties")

Docs.summary: Used to represent the schema information for a Tool, a Custom Build Rule, a PropertyPage, and so on.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Typically represented on disk as XAML, only one instance of this class is maintained per XAML file per project engine (solution).
If you manually instantiate this class, call <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.BeginInit%2A> before you set the first property of the object and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.EndInit%2A> after you set the last property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the list of categories that the properties in this belong to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This field is optional. The field returns only the categories that were explicitly defined and that do not contain any auto-generated categories. When a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> that is contained in this <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> declares its category to be something that is not present in this list, then a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category> that has that name is auto-generated and added to the internal list of categories. That auto-generated category is not returned by this field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary GetPropertiesByCategory() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a dictionary of all properties partitioned into categories.
Docs.returns: Returns a dictionary whose keys are the names and whose values are the list of properties in that category. The returned value is never .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The returned list may contain auto-generated categories. If a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> (or its derived classes) refer to a property that is not specified, then an new Category is generated for it. If no category is specified for the property, then the property is put in the "General" category.
The list of categories is exactly as specified in the XAML file. The auto-generated categories come after the specified categories but in no strict order.

Docs.param: The name of the category whose properties are to be returned.
Docs.summary: Returns the list of properties in a .
